sections.heading: 30-Day Return Policy
sections.content: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be returned in their original condition with all packaging and accessories included.

sections.heading: How to Return
sections.content: To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team with your order number. We will provide you with a return authorization and shipping instructions.

sections.heading: Refund Process
sections.content: Once we receive and inspect your returned item, we will process your refund within 5-7 business days. Refunds will be issued to your original payment method.

sections.heading: Exceptions
sections.content: Some items cannot be returned, including personalized products, downloadable software, and items marked as final sale. Please check the product description for details.

sections.heading: Damaged or Defective Items
sections.content: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact us immediately. We will arrange for a replacement or full refund, including return shipping costs.

sections.heading: Return Shipping
sections.content: Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the item is damaged, defective, or we made an error in your order.

sections.heading: 30天退货政策
sections.content: 我们为大多数商品提供30天退货政策。产品必须保持原始状态，包括所有包装和配件。

sections.heading: 如何退货
sections.content: 要启动退货，请联系我们的客户服务团队并提供您的订单号。我们将为您提供退货授权和运输说明。

sections.heading: 退款流程
sections.content: 一旦我们收到并检查您退回的商品，我们将在5-7个工作日内处理您的退款。退款将退还到您的原始付款方式。

sections.heading: 例外情况
sections.content: 某些商品不能退货，包括个性化产品、可下载软件和标记为最终销售的商品。请查看产品说明以获取详细信息。

sections.heading: 损坏或有缺陷的商品
sections.content: 如果您收到损坏或有缺陷的商品，请立即联系我们。我们将安排更换或全额退款，包括退货运费。

sections.heading: 退货运费
sections.content: 除非商品损坏、有缺陷或我们在您的订单中出错，否则客户需要承担退货运费。
